review: I feel doctor who is treating the kids has to be friendly murthy sir is very friendly with the kids. And he just came fr rounds and my kid loved meeting him when ever other doctors comes to visit she keeps asking wr is other doctor dats a very good sign I feel. Thanq murthy sir.
I would strongly recommend Dr. Satyanarayana Murthy. Sir is very friendly, simple and down to earth person . He is very good in finding out the root cause of problem.

I would strongly recommend Dr.Murthi Sir,he is treating my daughter really well he is a good listener too answers to all your queries, he make to feel child very much comfortable,he is easily reachable most of the times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was too good in treating kids and he was too patient with my daughter, will surely recommend

I took a online consultation for my son, who was suffering from fever.  Doctor asked few questions and told us viral fever and gave medication.First day we gave medication and by evening my son was better than 6 hours back. By next day there was no fever, cold or even cough. He was absolutely fine. Thanks a lot doctor
